alert.note: Alert for Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 12:02PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact the city of Prescott across Yavapai County through 1245 PM MST... At 1201 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over near Prescott, moving very slowly to the northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds of up to 40 mph, very heavy rainfall, and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This includes the following highways... State Route 89 between mile markers 303 and 327. State Route 89A between mile markers 318 and 322. State Route 69 between mile markers 288 and 296. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to minor flooding and ponding...especially across urban areas of Prescott. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways!

area.areaDesc: Yavapai County Mountains; Yavapai County Valleys and Basins
